name: 黃恆盛
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
schedule:
1-3周: semiconductor material and diode
4-5周: diode applications
6-8周: MOSFET and MOS Amplifers
9周: 期中考
10-12周:bipolar transistor and bipolar amplifers
13周: output stage and power amplifers
14周: analog circuits:OP amplifer circuits
15周: analog circuits:feedback circuit and stability
16-17周:logic application
18周:期末考
scorePolicy:
1.平時成績(含作業,小考,上課態度) 40%
2.期中考成績30%
3.期末考成績30%
materials: Microelectronics: circuit analysis and design / Donald A. Neamen
